name: Onslaught 2.2
description:
This is the original from back in the day! Place towers near the fixed path, upgrade them and combine them to create powerful Combos.

More information on the development can be found on Patreon, for now the Flash EXE file is the best I can offer, the future releases will be done in Java, when I am done rewriting the game. Sadly, Flash is being discontinued and uninstalled all over the place, but I managed to export this program with a test version of flash and the original files from Gaby.

Donations are greatly appreciated and half of the proceeds will be donated to charities.

The game itself features a tutorial, and there is documentation I am planning to modernize, on my website that is linked in game and you can find it here, too.

If there is anything you need, feel free to spam the comments, I will do my best to answer as soon as possible!
